documentation.title: KoolAutoCompleteItem Class [PHP]
documentation.metakeywords: php ajax autocomplete, php autocomplete, php ajax autosuggest, php autosuggest
documentation.metadescription: KoolAutoComplete is excellent PHP Ajax AutoComplete. Flexible rendering, elegant behavior together with Ajax Load On-Demand have made KoolAutoComplete the great choice to replace limited auto-complete provided by browsers.

property.name: data
property.shortdesc: Get or set data of item
property.longdesc: Get or set data of item. The values from this data array will be used to render item.
property.samplecode:
<?php
	$item = $kac->addItem("Software","soft");
	$item->data["image"] = "resources/software.gif";
	//Add image to data array of item 
	$item->data["anykey"] = "Any value"; 
?>
